name: Beyblade VForce: Super Tournament Battle
storyline: In the game the player creates a blader and their own Beyblade and competes in a Beybalde tournament to become the best Blader. While Kai is the main character in the game with your Blader, Tyson and Ray are in supporting roles.
summary: Beyblade VForce: Super Tournament Battle is a Beyblade 2002 role-playing video game. The game was released originally on December 19, 2002 in Japan and was later released in the west in 2003. It is based on the Beyblade VForce season.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
